=Example of file that launch application=

_/site/public/index.php_
{{{

<?php
/**
 * Peak example app launch
 */

/**
 * REQUIRED CONSTANTS
 */
define('PUBLIC_ROOT',        'site/public');
define('LIBRARY_ROOT',       'peakdev/branches/0.8.6/library');
define('APPLICATION_ROOT',   'site/app/demoapp');
define('APPLICATION_CONFIG', 'app.ini');

/**
 * OPTIONNAL CONSTANTS 
 * You can alternatively define this constant in .htaccess file with command "SetEnv APPLICATION_ENV"
 */
define('APPLICATION_ENV',  'development');

include './../../../'.LIBRARY_ROOT.'/Peak/boot.php';


try {
   //start app
   $app = Peak_Core::init(5);
   
   //run and render app  
   $app->run()
       ->render();         
}
catch (Exception $e) {

    echo $e->getMessage();
}

}}}
